formatted_address: 3 South Buona Vista Rd, Viva Vista Shopping Mall, Singapore 118136
name: Viva Vista Shopping Mall

reviews.text: I hate to give this mall a bad review as I feel really bad for anyone that has a lease there as we were there on Sunday and pretty much their only customers across the whole mall at that time, except for the tutoring center. It’s a little hard to spot and there isn’t much foot traffic, so I all concerned about the lease holders there.
Worst parking idea ever, waste of time, it’s better to park somewhere else and walk over.

There is no management ! The place is very quite like ghost town however the management did not do anything to help the shop or the tenants, they make life difficult for everyone !  The worse is the pigeon problem, due to too many pigeons, shit everywhere the whole condo and shopping mall , ended up turn into a nest for big flies keep breeding there non stop.  Always got big flies invading the whole Viva Vista Condo and Mall.  Complaints and nobody care and following up.

Basic shopping for small groceries, pet supplies, dry cleaning etc. It's part of a residential complex and I believe more stores are going to open. They also have a couple interesting stores like a drone shop and some salons. Most shops closed during my stay due to the Chinese New year.
Biggest shopping mall last floor have some food shop playing place for children and many shops

vicinity: 3 South Buona Vista Road, Viva Vista Shopping Mall
